# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `mdeath`
* Variable label: `Month of death`
* Variable description: `month of death`
* Domain: `Death`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
1        | january
2        | february
3        | march 
4        | april
5        | may
6        | june
7        | july
8        | august
9        | september
10       | october
11       | november
12       | december

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing


```{r lab, echo=FALSE}
ds_label <- "Month of death"
```


## Cuba

### Wave 1

There is no variable.





### Wave 2

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `death_date`|
|-|-|
| **Label** | `date of death`|
| **Table name** | `pyears_(mortality_cohort)_2_0` |
| **Description** |  |


```{r assign_cuba2, echo=FALSE}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_id_w1','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline',
                         variables=list('centreid'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_id_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_id_w1')

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_id_w2','10-66.1066-Cuba-Followup',
                         variables=list('centreid'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_id_w2 <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_id_w2')

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_mdeath2','10-66.pyears_(mortality_cohort)_2_0',
                         variables=list('death_date'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_mdeath2 <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_mdeath2')
t1066_mdeath2$mdeath <- format(t1066_mdeath2$death_date, '%m')
t1066_mdeath2 <- t1066_mdeath2[c("id", "mdeath")]

same_indiv <- function(old, new){
  
  new_2 <- matrix(NA, nrow = dim(new)[1], ncol=dim(old)[2])
  oldm <- as.matrix(old)
  
  for(i in 1:length(new$id)){
    if(sum(new$id[i]==old$id)>=1){
      new_2[i,] <- oldm[which(new$id[i]==old$id),]
    } else {
      new_2[i,] <- c(new$id[i], NA)
    }
  }
  
  new_22 <- data.frame(id=new_2[,1], mdeath=as.numeric(new_2[,2]))
  new_22
}

t1066_mdeath <- same_indiv(old = t1066_mdeath2, new = t1066_id_w1)
```

```{r local_cuba2, echo=FALSE}
vari <- t1066_mdeath[[2]]
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = ds_label) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(t1066_mdeath, aes(x=factor(vari))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

The harmonized variable is the same than the study-specific variable, but the missing values have to be recoded as follows:

* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo_cuba2, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_cuba_w2 <- tibble(id=t1066_mdeath$id)
t1066_ds_cuba_w2$mdeath <- car::recode(t1066_mdeath$mdeath, "NA=999")
t1066_ds_cuba_w2$mdeath <- labelled(t1066_ds_cuba_w2$mdeath, labels = c("january"=1, "february"=2, "march"=3, "april"=4, "may"=5, "june"=6, "july"=7, "august"=8, "september"=9, "october"=10, "november"=11, "december"=12, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not attempt not done"=994, "Does not answer"=996,  "Not applicable"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript_cuba2, echo=FALSE}
vari <- t1066_ds_cuba_w2$mdeath
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w2, aes(x=factor(mdeath))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation_cuba2, echo=FALSE}
BeforeH <- table(t1066_mdeath$mdeath, useNA = "ifany")
AfterH <- table(t1066_ds_cuba_w2$mdeath)
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c(names(AfterH)[1:(length(AfterH)-1)], "NA->999")
kable(C)
```


```{r importOPAL_cuba_w2, echo=FALSE}
label(t1066_ds_cuba_w2$mdeath) <- ds_label
mdeath <- t1066_ds_cuba_w2
save(mdeath, file = "../RData/cuba_w2/mdeath.RData")
rm(mdeath, t1066_id_w1, t1066_id_w2, t1066_mdeath2, t1066_mdeath)
```

### Wave 2

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `death_date`|
|-|-|
| **Label** | `date of death`|
| **Table name** | `pyears_(mortality_cohort)_2_0` |
| **Description** |  |

```{r assign_PR2, echo=FALSE} 
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_id_w1','10-66.1066-PuertoRico-Baseline',
                         variables=list('centreid'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_id_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_id_w1')

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_id_w2','10-66.1066-PuertoRico-Followup',
                         variables=list('centreid'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_id_w2 <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_id_w2')

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_mdeath2','10-66.pyears_(mortality_cohort)_2_0',
                         variables=list('death_date'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_mdeath2 <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_mdeath2')
t1066_mdeath2$mdeath <- format(t1066_mdeath2$death_date, '%m')
t1066_mdeath2 <- t1066_mdeath2[c("id", "mdeath")]

same_indiv <- function(old, new){
  
  new_2 <- matrix(NA, nrow = dim(new)[1], ncol=dim(old)[2])
  oldm <- as.matrix(old)
  
  for(i in 1:length(new$id)){
    if(sum(new$id[i]==old$id)>=1){
      new_2[i,] <- oldm[which(new$id[i]==old$id),]
    } else {
      new_2[i,] <- c(new$id[i], NA)
    }
  }
  
  new_22 <- data.frame(id=new_2[,1], mdeath=as.numeric(new_2[,2]))
  new_22
}

t1066_mdeath <- same_indiv(old = t1066_mdeath2, new = t1066_id_w1)
```


#### Harmonisation algorithm
The harmonized variable is the same than the study-specific variable, but the missing values have to be recoded as follows:

* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo_PR2, echo=TRUE} 
t1066_ds_PR_w2 <- tibble(id=t1066_mdeath$id)
t1066_ds_PR_w2$mdeath <- car::recode(t1066_mdeath$mdeath, "NA=999")
t1066_ds_PR_w2$mdeath <- labelled(t1066_ds_PR_w2$mdeath, labels = c("january"=1, "february"=2, "march"=3, "april"=4, "may"=5, "june"=6, "july"=7, "august"=8, "september"=9, "october"=10, "november"=11, "december"=12, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not attempt not done"=994, "Does not answer"=996,  "Not applicable"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

```{r descript_PR2, echo=FALSE} 
ggplot(t1066_ds_PR_w2, aes(x=factor(mdeath))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```
